alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Hoke (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 6:53PM EDT until May 06 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Cumberland County in central North Carolina... Eastern Hoke County in central North Carolina... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 653 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wakulla, or over Red Springs, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Raeford, Fort Bragg, Antioch, Pope AFB, Hope Mills, Spring Lake, Eastover, Wade and Rockfish. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central North Carolina. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central North Carolina.
